query:
SELECT DATE(entryDate) as trade_date, COUNT(*) as trade_count, SUM(pnl) as daily_pnl
FROM trades
WHERE entryDate >= '2025-10-01' AND entryDate < '2025-11-01'
GROUP BY DATE(entryDate)
ORDER BY trade_date;
